title: Account lost
body:
I've been trying to recovert my account for about one week now. I've tryied every thing: recovert my password (no email received), contact riots game with 3 email adresses and with 3 of there adresses (no answer from them. I never changed my password and it's not working anymore. Can riot answer me plz, I've spent 300$ on this account

Thank you

replies.body:
It doesn't look like we've gotten any tickets regarding this account recently, so go ahead and shoot us another ticket by clicking here-> [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Make sure to pick "I need help recovering my account" so that our account agents can help you get back in the game!
